description: Tourism can be a great source of employment here. The poorest of the poor can also earn: PM @narendramodi in Kanyakumari — narendramodi_in (@narendramodi_in) May 8, 2016 Good infrastru
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Campaigned in Kanyakumari. From improving tourism infrastructure to better roads, highlighted Centre’s efforts for Kanyakumari’s progress. 

Tamil Nadu needs a Govt. that is not corrupt. Till corruption is there, the fruits of development will not reach the poor. BJP is always sensitive to the concerns & aspirations of TN & will work for the interests of people. http://nm-4.com/t7jo
